channel.title: My scar mini game preveiw :)
channel.description:
hi everyone :),
well ive allways been inspiried by kaitnieks bejeweled script, though the code is tough i have been able to learn from it and yesterday started to experimet. i wanted to make something quite enjoyable and maybe even amusing so i got to work and made some sprites and a small map to test and this is what i got so far....
*note* the images are evry low quality.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img168.imageshack.us/img168/654/image11qy.jpg[/img][/URL] thats just me walking on a road.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img178.imageshack.us/img178/371/image34id.jpg[/img][/URL] walked a lil further :D
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img416.imageshack.us/img416/6250/minimonster4wj.jpg[/img][/URL] i added a monster and im just about to go and attack it.
well i was hoping you guys could help me build form this and maybe i could input anything you would like to see? thx...

looks like pokemon, only instead of Ash, its the mushroom from mario, in superstar saga quality =-)
